# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it's worth more than $8000 to you. To ensure we're on the same page about its true worth, I propose an offer of $12000 for the product. I trust this price reflects its immense value and potential benefits for you. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further or exploring any other options. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
